Package helper

Class Validation

java.lang.Object
helper.Validation
public class Validation extends Object
Class that contains validation functions for empty input, empty text fields, combo box widgets, and date time pickers. Time validation for valid start-end times and scheduling conflicts.

      public static boolean isEmptyString(javafx.scene.control.TextField textField, String textFieldName)
      Checks if a TextField is empty and shows an error alert if it is.

      textField - The TextField to be checked.
      textFieldName - The name of the TextField for the error message.
      Returns:
      True if the TextField is empty, false otherwise.

    • isInvalidTimeCombination

      public static boolean isInvalidTimeCombination(LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, String textFieldName)
      Checks if the end time is before or equal to the start time and shows an error alert if it is.
      Parameters:
      start - The start time.
      end - The end time.
      textFieldName - The name of the field for the error message.
      Returns:
      True if the time combination is invalid, false otherwise.

    • dateIsOutsideBusinessHours

      public static boolean dateIsOutsideBusinessHours(LocalDateTime startTime, LocalDateTime endTime)
      Checks if the appointment time is outside business hours or on a weekend and shows an error alert if it is.
      Parameters:
      startTime - The start time of the appointment.
      endTime - The end time of the appointment.
      Returns:
      True if the appointment time is outside business hours or on a weekend, false otherwise.

    • conflictingAppointment

      public static boolean conflictingAppointment(LocalDateTime newStartDate, LocalDateTime newEndDate, int cusID)
      Checks for conflicting appointments when adding a new appointment.
      Parameters:
      newStartDate - The start date and time of the new appointment.
      newEndDate - The end date and time of the new appointment.
      cusID - The customer ID associated with the appointment.
      Returns:
      True if there is a conflicting appointment, false otherwise.

    • conflictingAppointment

      public static boolean conflictingAppointment(LocalDateTime newStartDate, LocalDateTime newEndDate, int cusID, int appointmentID)
      Checks for conflicting appointments when modifying an existing appointment.
      Parameters:
      newStartDate - The start date and time of the modified appointment.
      newEndDate - The end date and time of the modified appointment.
      cusID - The customer ID associated with the appointment.
      appointmentID - The ID of the appointment being modified.
      Returns:
      True if there is a conflicting appointment, false otherwise.
